post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (class_exists('Spatie\\Permission\\PermissionServiceProvider')) { echo 'Spatie already installed. Skipping vendor publish.'; } else { system('php artisan vendor:publish --provider=\"Spatie\\Permission\\PermissionServiceProvider\" --tag=config'); system('php artisan vendor:publish --provider=\"Spatie\\LaravelPermission\\PermissionServiceProvider\" --tag=migrations'); }"
